column4: Microsoft expands rural U.S. campaign with Green Bay Packers tie-up
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Microsoft Corp  has teamed up with the National Football League's Green Bay Packers in a $10 million partnership intended to spur tech innovation in Wisconsin  the software company said on Thursday.

column4: UPDATE 1-U.S. auto reliability dented by new technology; electric cars fare better - report
column5: DETROIT  Oct 19 New technology to stream music into dashboards or boost fuel efficiency is making cars less reliable  although electric cars such as the Tesla Model 3 and the Chevrolet Bolt should fare better than many conventional models  Consumer Reports magazine said on Thursday.

column4: Tesla's Model 3 gets an 'average' as new tech dents auto reliability - Consumer Reports
column5: DETROIT  Oct 19 Tesla Inc's new Model 3 sedan is likely to have "average" reliability despite production snags because it uses older technology rather than newer innovations that are causing problems for automakers  Consumer Reports magazine said on Thursday.

column4: Chinese-funded EV startup buys tech firm headed by former Tesla executive
column5: BEIJING  Oct 19 SF Motors Inc  a California-based electric vehicle (EV) unit of China's Chongqing Sokon Industry Group Co Ltd  on Thursday said it has bought an EV and battery tech firm headed by former Tesla Inc executive Martin Eberhard for $33 million.
